original_text: And God said, “Let the waters swarm with swarms of living creatures, and let birds fly above the earth across the expanse of the heavens.”
korean_text: 하나님이 이르시되 물들은 생물을 번성하게 하라 땅 위 하늘의 궁창에는 새가 날으라 하시고

sentences.original_text: Let the waters swarm with swarms of living creatures,
and let birds fly above the earth
across the expanse of the heavens.”
